original_text: And stood at his feet behind him weeping, and began to wash his feet with tears, and did wipe them with the hairs of her head, and kissed his feet, and anointed them with the ointment.
korean_text: 예수의 뒤로 그 발 곁에 서서 울며 눈물로 그 발을 적시고 자기 머리털로 닦고 그 발에 입맞추고 향유를 부으니

sentences.original_text: And stood at his feet behind him
and began to wash his feet with tears
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 눈물로 그의 발을 씻기 시작했으며

sentences.original_text: and did wipe them with the hairs of her head
and anointed them with the ointment
